review:
To say or how to say a big thanks and a big smile as the journey right from the beginning to the end that is delivering the baby and afterwards too has been so harmonious and so pleasant and so guided by the doctor that we can't say enough. We can't put it into words rather I would say as doctor Siddesh has been a companion and a strong pillar of support, he has guided us, he has explained every minor detail. Whatever questions we asked, might have been silly too but he answered them patiently with a smile the smile on doctor Siddhesh's face is magnetic and I would say we are encouraged to ask questions and have them answered. So it was a very beautiful experience we never felt that we are going to a hospital or to Meet a doctor it was like a friend was waiting for us on the other side and what do I say about Mrs. Doc ? Mrs. Doc is a pillar of support And a big thanks to the staff too. The staff is also very cooperative. Atmosphere at the clinicI puts you at your ease as soon as you enter . To meet the Doctors and talk to them was a stress reliever, it gives you relief even for from your minor ills, and you know minor things which disturb during pregnancy and delivery . It was a joyful journey that's all we can say thanks  to both the doctors to Doc and Mrs. Doc  thank you üôèüèª

Even when something  puts you down or you feel a little down and things are a little greyish, I would say one talk with the doctor and it puts you back on track you feel OK . He is there for us . I would say from beginning to end of my journey They are there for you. Both of the docs thanksüåπ

We are grateful to Dr. Siddhesh Iyer for his medical advice as well as highly approachable nature through the journey of pregnancy, delivery and post-partum. Thank you Sir for all the tips, advices and professional help to cope with all the concerns we faced. The staff at the hospital is also very co-operative and helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is very true that he is very friendly,we can talk him about any problems ,our doubts and questions will be answered with a cute smile.I can't forget my first post operation day, Midnight 12'o clock he came to hospital from his home to solve my silly problem.Dr Siddesh,I don't remember that,i said sorry that day ,but now I am saying Sorry for that.
reply_text: I am thankful to you for having so much faith in me.

review:
He is a very good doctor *** ******** ********* ** *** *****... He is very friendly & his diagnosis is very perfect & explains the treatment/solution in a very simple & calm manner which everyone can relate to...
The medicine or the treatment provided is spot on & starts giving results immediately...

We have very happy with Dr explanations and advice, it's like one friend were met with other friend.
Dr has given us right direction at right time.
I recommended surely if someone want to consult.
Consultancy also at reasonable price.
Thank a lot Dr.Siddesh Iyer.
100% satisfied

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Visited this Doctor after I diagnosed with endometriasis/chocolate cyst.Before visiting Doctor 
we(I &my husband) were very tensed regarding  chocolate cyst and our chances of conception. Doctor explained us the condition and recommended laparoscopy.
Today, one week After Surgery I'm back to normal, I'm feeling better than before.
I recommend this Doctor for his expertise, he is up to date with disease conditions , treatment options.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Dr siddhesh is very friendly and approachable gynaecologist I have ever met. Very scared person like me to meet gynaecologist , when i met him... The first day only i was very comfortable. The way he explains you the treatment, makes u comfortable, your half fear and illness run away. I underwent pap smear at his clinic which was done very delicately, skillfully and was painless experience. 
Thank you dr for great experience. 
I will surely recommend him to my friends and relatives.

review: After many rounds and visits to various OBGYN I finally landed up with Dr. Siddhesh. My partner and I are happy and contented that the birth of our baby is in good hands.
